No prob, Jer. Though about the merciless part, how can one show an 
adjective?

::Autofire::

Autofire chuckles to himself, the pod closing and lifting off the 
ground, heading for the closes base, which was Motormaster's ship. 
Autofire turns to Megatron.

"We're going to do a quick fly-by and a scan to figure out how good 
the base is. We might get fired at, so prepare for impact."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: Never mind Yan, I found it. Sorry if I upset anyone with my 
joke post.
> I dont know what I was thinking.
> 
> BIC:
> Megatron takes two cubes and sucks them dry. His body began to hum, 
as his
> energy burners shift to life. For the first time in a long while 
Megatron
> feels strong again. He clenches his fist tightly, a small aura of 
energy
> surrounds it. "I can feel the power, finally," he exlcaims.  He 
then looks
> up at Autofire, his eyes glow a deep red. "You my friend will be a 
welcomed
> troop to the Decepticon ranks, you show merciless, and that is a 
respected
> trait in the Decepticons."
